articles.title: Unlikely monkeypox outbreak will lead to pandemic, WHO says - Reuters
articles.description: The World Health Organization does not believe the monkeypox outbreak outside Africa will lead to a pandemic, an official said on Monday, adding it remains unclear if infected people who are not displaying symptoms can transmit the disease.
